Meet the Master Judge
Gail Bowman

I'm Gail Bowman from San Diego California. An award winning Fashion Photographer with 15 years of experience creating model portfolios for individuals and international modeling agencies. From fledgling models to seasoned actors, my work can be found in Vogue Italia to IMDB. Read more

Welcome to the Action-Packed photo contest! This is a competition for photographers who love capturing the thrill and excitement of action-packed moments. We are looking for photos that capture movement, energy, and excitement in a single frame. Whether it's sports, adventure, or any other fast-paced activity, we want to see your best shots that showcase the action.
